author: rymc
message:
Clarify error message to ensure min 28x28 image supplied for Qwen 2.5 VL (#37264)

fix: clarify error message for min 28x28 images

Co-authored-by: Pavel Iakubovskii <qubvel@gmail.com>

files.patch:
@@ -66,7 +66,7 @@ def smart_resize(
 
     """
     if height < factor or width < factor:
-        raise ValueError(f"height:{height} or width:{width} must be larger than factor:{factor}")
+        raise ValueError(f"height:{height} and width:{width} must be larger than factor:{factor}")
     elif max(height, width) / min(height, width) > 200:
         raise ValueError(
             f"absolute aspect ratio must be smaller than 200, got {max(height, width) / min(height, width)}"
